articles.description: TCL is an increasingly well-known name in the area of cost-effective big-screens in the US. Now, it has released some of its smart TVs that run Android into this market. These 3-Series devices incorporate Chromecast functions, the Google Assistant and all the…
articles.content: TCL already sells a number of TV lines in the US, one of which also incorporates the Roku smart system. Now, the OEM has announced that it has started to add its Android-capable series to this list. … [+803 chars]

articles.title: Moto G Fast and Moto E: Motorola launches two budget phones under $200 - CNET
articles.description: The Moto G Fast and Moto E are the latest affordable phones that bring solid features and a wallet-friendly price.
articles.content:

articles.author: Mariella Moon
articles.title: Riot Games will donate $1 million to support racial equality - Yahoo Finance Australia
articles.description: Riot is responding to anti-racism protests by pledging $1 million toward the ACLU and The Innocence Project.
articles.content: Riot Games President Dylan Jadeja has published a letter revealing how the company intends to help combat racism and injustice. In it, Jadeja has announced that the developer is committing $1 million… [+1531 chars]
